key.name: use-conn
key.description: Whether connectivity managers should be used to automatically disconnect/reconnect.

key.name: autoconnect
key.description: Whether Empathy should automatically log into your accounts on startup.

key.name: autoaway
key.description: Whether Empathy should go into away mode automatically if user is idle.

key.name: import-asked
key.summary: Empathy has asked about importing accounts
key.description: Whether Empathy has asked about importing accounts from other programs.

key.name: butterfly-logs-migrated
key.description: Whether Empathy has migrated butterfly logs.

key.name: file-transfer-default-folder
key.description: The default folder to save file transfers in.

key.name: show-offline
key.description: Whether to show contacts that are offline in the contact list.

key.name: show-avatars
key.description: Whether to show avatars for contacts in the contact list and chat windows.

key.name: show-protocols
key.description: Whether to show protocols for contacts in the contact list.

key.name: compact-contact-list
key.description: Whether to show the contact list in compact mode.

key.name: main-window-hidden
key.description: Hide the main window.

key.name: avatar-directory
key.summary: Default directory to select an avatar image from
key.description: The last directory that an avatar image was chosen from.

key.name: separate-chat-windows
key.summary: Open new chats in separate windows
key.description: Always open a separate chat window for new chats.

key.name: sort-criterium
key.description: Which criterion to use when sorting the contact list. Default is to sort by the contact's name with the value "name". A value of "state" will sort the contact list by state.

key.name: sounds-enabled
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of events.

key.name: sounds-disabled-away
key.description: Whether to play sound notifications when away or busy.

key.name: sounds-incoming-message
key.summary: Play a sound for incoming messages
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of incoming messages.

key.name: sounds-outgoing-message
key.summary: Play a sound for outgoing messages
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of outgoing messages.

key.name: sounds-new-conversation
key.summary: Play a sound for new conversations
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of new conversations.

key.name: sounds-contact-login
key.summary: Play a sound when a contact logs in
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of contacts logging into the network.

key.name: sounds-contact-logout
key.summary: Play a sound when a contact logs out
key.description: Whether to play a sound to notify of contacts logging out of the network.

key.name: sounds-service-login
key.summary: Play a sound when we log in
key.description: Whether to play a sound when logging into a network.

key.name: sounds-service-logout
key.summary: Play a sound when we log out
key.description: Whether to play a sound when logging out of a network.

key.name: notifications-enabled
key.summary: Enable popup notifications for new messages
key.description: Whether to show a popup notification when receiving a new message.

key.name: notifications-disabled-away
key.description: Whether to show popup notifications when away or busy.

key.name: notifications-focus
key.summary: Pop up notifications if the chat isn't focused
key.description: Whether to show a popup notification when receiving a new message even if the chat is already opened, but not focused.

key.name: notifications-contact-signin
key.summary: Pop up notifications when a contact logs in
key.description: Whether to show a popup notification when a contact goes online.

key.name: notifications-contact-signout
key.summary: Pop up notifications when a contact logs out
key.description: Whether to show a popup notification when a contact goes offline.

key.name: graphical-smileys
key.description: Whether to convert smileys into graphical images in conversations.

key.name: show-contacts-in-rooms
key.description: Whether to show the contact list in chat rooms.

key.name: theme
key.description: The theme that is used to display the conversation in chat windows.

key.name: adium-path
key.summary: Path of the Adium theme to use
key.description: Path of the Adium theme to use if the theme used for chat is Adium.

key.name: enable-webkit-developer-tools
key.description: Whether WebKit developer tools, such as the Web Inspector, should be enabled.

key.name: theme-chat-room
key.description: Whether to use the theme for chat rooms.

key.name: spell-checker-languages
key.description: Comma-separated list of spell checker languages to use (e.g. "en, fr, nl").

key.name: spell-checker-enabled
key.description: Whether to check words typed against the languages you want to check with.

key.name: nick-completion-char
key.description: Character to add after nickname when using nick completion (tab) in group chat.

key.name: avatar-in-icon
key.summary: Empathy should use the avatar of the contact as the chat window icon
key.description: Whether Empathy should use the avatar of the contact as the chat window icon.

key.name: close-main-window
key.summary: Show hint about closing the main window
key.description: Whether to show the message dialog about closing the main window with the 'x' button in the title bar.

key.name: imported-mc4-accounts
key.description: MC 4 accounts have been imported.

key.name: publish
key.summary: Empathy can publish the user's location
key.description: Whether Empathy can publish the user's location to their contacts.

key.name: resource-network
key.summary: Empathy can use the network to guess the location
key.description: Whether Empathy can use the network to guess the location.

key.name: resource-cell
key.summary: Empathy can use the cellular network to guess the location
key.description: Whether Empathy can use the cellular network to guess the location.

key.name: resource-gps
key.summary: Empathy can use the GPS to guess the location
key.description: Whether Empathy can use the GPS to guess the location.

key.name: reduce-accuracy
key.summary: Empathy should reduce the location's accuracy
key.description: Whether Empathy should reduce the location's accuracy for privacy reasons.
